summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to land use and zoning, amending Sections 23.55.012, 23.66.160 and 23.66.338 of the land Use Code, Section 23.60.180 of the Seattle Shoreline Master Program (as authorized by the Revised Code of Washington 90.58) and repealing Chapter 2.24 of the Seattle Municipal Code (Political Sign Ordinance), adopting revised regulations for temporary signs.
committee: Housing, Community Development and Urban Environment
